lu2
HSK 6: 爐,炉
Freq: 8227
古称经脱胶分纺绩的麻缕（纱）为纑。《史记》货殖传注：“纑，纻属，可以为布。” 纻是指苎麻。
In ancient times, the hemp strand (yarn) that has been degummed and divided into spinning performance was called 纑. "Historical Records" Note: "Yu, 纻 genus, can be cloth." 纻 refers to ramie.

纑字的基本解释

纑
lú
麻线：“彼身织屡，妻辟纑。”
指练过的麻线。
苎麻一类的植物。
古通“櫨”，柱上方木。
古通“壚”，黑色而坚硬的土壤。
古国名。

纑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lú］
［《廣韻》落胡切，平模，來。］
(1)麻缕。
(2)练麻。
(3)指纺棉。
(4)麻类植物。
(5)两木间的空处。
(6)通“壚”。一种黑色的土壤。
(7)古国名。见《史记·周本纪》。

纑字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　纑； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页943第11
【廣韻】落胡切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】籠都切，?音盧。【說文】布縷也。【孟子】妻辟纑。【趙岐註】練其麻曰纑。　又【史記·貨殖傳】山西饒材竹纑。【註】纑，紵屬，可以爲布。【五經文字】經典亦作盧。

纑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
纑字的起名意思

暂无。

纑
Basic explanation of words
纑
lú
Twine: "His body is weaving repeatedly, and his wife has robed it."
Refers to the trained twine.
Plants such as ramie.
The ancient pass "Pan" has wood on the top of the column.
Gutong "luo", black and hard soil.
Ancient country name.
纑
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [lú]
["Guangyun" Luo Huqie, flat model, come. ]
(1) Hemp thread.
(2) Practicing hemp.
(3) Refers to spinning cotton.
(4) Hemp plants.
(5) The empty space between the two woods.
(6) Through "Liu". A black soil.
(7) Ancient country name. See "Historical Records · Zhou Benji".
纑
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Shizi Department] 　纑; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 943 11
[Guang Yun] Luo Hu cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Cage all cut,? Yin Lu. [Said the text] Bu Yu also. [Mencius] Wife Piyu. [Zhao Qi's Note] Practicing his hemp is 纑.　[Historical Records · Commodity Heritage] Shanxi Raocaizhuzhu. [Note] 纑, genus 纻, can be cloth. 【The Five Classics】The classics are also called Lu.
